home.title:
Drill. Loot. Repeat.
Then fight for survival.
home.list1:
CosmoFox is a Telegram-native, multi-
 stage Web3 game.
home.list2:
Start as a space-mining fox — drilling
 planets, collecting crystals, and
 upgrading your gear.
home.list3: More crystals = a bigger airdrop share.

about.title: about COSMOFOX
about.list1:
CosmoFox takes you on a galactic journey that
 evolves over time.
about.list2:
What begins as a simple race for resources grows
 into a richer universe with new mechanics,
 evolving gameplay, and an economy powered by
 $Zylo.
about.list3:
Phase 1 — a fast-paced clicker race: drill, loot
 and earn your share of the airdrop.
about.list4:
Phase 2 — the game expands: deeper mechanics, new
 challenges, and fresh ways to use $Zylo.
